fields.name: act_id
fields.description: A and a five-digit number (leading zeros)

fields.name: action
fields.description: The verb describing the type of reading

fields.name: act_object
fields.description: The object read by the subject

fields.name: act_target
fields.description: Transitive subject (B), as in A reads book to B

fields.name: start
fields.description: Year in EDTF when act begins

fields.name: end
fields.description: Year in EDTF when act ends

fields.name: discussion
fields.description: substantial comment or quotation from source

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page range in source evidence for act

fields.name: commentary
fields.description: Commentary, esp. on underspecified reading acts

fields.name: created
fields.description: structural entry creation date of entry

fields.name: created_by
fields.description: structural entry acronym of project member creating entry

fields.name: last_modified_by
fields.description: structural entry acronym of project member last modifying entry
